title: Hitting 'Screen Call' button on Pixel 3XL no longer screens calls, after last night's update.
content: Instead of what used to happen(Google Assistant would screen call with real time text), it now just answers the call. It has led to some awkward conversations today. I didn't know if there was a quick fix to this, or we're going to have to wait for another update.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
